title: Long Horn, Big Shaggy
description: There's things out there that you ain't dreamed of. Like back-from-the-dead mountainmen, carrion stallions and zombified buffalo. LONG HORN, BIG A wild wierd western tale of horror and jerked meat. If Louis Lamour and Stephen King got drunk and made a cosmic voodoo lovechild - they'd baptise it LONG HORN, BIG SHAGGY. Buy it now from Black Death Books.
author: Steve Vernon
